title: Ticket #7575: Transfer Stats Showing non-sense numbers
description:
The Transfer Accounting is reporting non-sense numbers. This was captured in the OSG SAND project as we are capturing the data for network diagnostics. Specifically, this issue was captured from data from the Wisconsin submit host submit-1.chtc.wisc.edu.

The log lines in the transfer accounting are (new lines added for readability):

~5 Exabytes: 

03/28/20 01:34:41 (D_STATS) (5663551.0) (3165304): (peer stats from starter): File Transfer Upload: JobId: 5663551.0 files: 4 bytes: 5764607527811476784 seconds: -1585376537.30
dest: 128.104.101.92 rto: 202000 ato: 40000 snd_mss: 1448 rcv_mss: 536 unacked: 0 sacked: 0 lost: 0 retrans: 0 fackets: 0 pmtu: 1500 rcv_ssthresh: 64088
rtt: 1413 snd_ssthresh: 44 snd_cwnd: 165 advmss: 1448 reordering: 104 rcv_rtt: 0 rcv_space: 14480 total_retrans: 24

124TB: 

03/27/20 16:41:16 (D_STATS) (5663464.0) (2966004): (peer stats from starter): File Transfer Upload: JobId: 5663464.0 files: 8 bytes: 140741903547605 seconds: -1585345213.54
dest: 128.104.101.92 rto: 201000 ato: 40000 snd_mss: 1448 rcv_mss: 536 unacked: 0 sacked: 0 lost: 0 retrans: 0 fackets: 0 pmtu: 1500 rcv_ssthresh: 64088
rtt: 666 snd_ssthresh: 195 snd_cwnd: 142 advmss: 1448 reordering: 3 rcv_rtt: 0 rcv_space: 14480 total_retrans: 0

~5 Exabytes 

03/27/20 01:41:22 (D_STATS) (5663464.0) (2634501): (peer stats from starter): File Transfer Upload: JobId: 5663464.0 files: 8 bytes: 5764607527811517932 seconds: -1585290855.18
dest: 128.104.101.92 rto: 201000 ato: 40000 snd_mss: 1448 rcv_mss: 536 unacked: 0 sacked: 0 lost: 0 retrans: 0 fackets: 0 pmtu: 1500 rcv_ssthresh: 64088
rtt: 916 snd_ssthresh: 186 snd_cwnd: 430 advmss: 1448 reordering: 130 rcv_rtt: 0 rcv_space: 14480 total_retrans: 15

Note that they are all "peer stats from starter", and the "seconds" field is negative, which should not be possible. The seconds field is approximately the unix epoch date and time of the log line.
creator: dweitzel
